title: rachael9385
author: rachael9385
content: My pipo, Una good evening oo, e get one kind of thing way scammers them take they scam people this days, and I know say some of us here go done they aware of am and many people too done fall victim for those kind things them.The thing be say, them go call you con tell you say somebody for una or a member of your family dey sick seriously and em done rush am go hospital and the doctor say if Una no deposit money first em no go start the operation.And the way them go call you, tension self go hold you, if you no be person way get mind you fit still collapse instantly (e done happen to me and them say nah my mother but God forbid nah their mama no be my lovely mother).The way e take start be say, I just dey one hot afternoon dey reason how I go take flex this Christmas season, nai call enter my phone and the person dey cry seriously say em be my mama friend for our village (and really really my mother dey village) and the guy say appendix done bos for my mama belle say them done rush her go hospital, say the doctor say em no go start work if we no drop deposit of 90k, so me self tension enter my body, that time that time, I done start to dey find were I go get 90k to send and i done already tell them to send account number so them con send me paga account. After I find the money finish, something con enter my mind say make I call one of my uncle way dey close to our house and I call am ask am about my mama, em con talk say she dey find but I no tell am anything at all.Then letter the scammers call me back say make I do fast deposit the money.... ASAP na I tell am say NA EM MAMA GO DIE, at first em no talk then em end the call, then I call my mother and she pick the call, we talk wella but I no still tell her watin happen.And today this same thing happened to one of my close friend too, em no tell me even when I ask her until when we done reach POS shop nah she tell me, then i tell her make she no send the money say nah scam and i still tell her make she make call her family person first ask questions, and so she did,,, finally finally, all nah scam. So all this long story be say make we dey careful as scammers done enter streets with another formula.

comments.author: Obim34
comments.body: We get to dey on guard as this na festive season all this fraudster dey in a haunt for who go fall victim but normally our God big pass dem.See the kind extent wey all this people dey go just to fraud person for this kind hard economy wey everybody dey find way to survive. Dey come use mother base on say they no say nobody dey joke with em mama so make we try dey careful, make we dey shine our eyes wella so we no go fall victim.I go advise say make we use this Truecaller app as e dey easily detect scammers attack as na wetin me I dey use so when i see their call I no dey pick.

comments.author: Lida93
comments.body: Quote from: rachael9385 on December 15, 2023, 07:36:32 PMMy pipo, Una good evening oo, e get one kind of thing way scammers them take they scam people this days, and I know say some of us here go done they aware of am and many people too done fall victim for those kind things them.The thing be say, them go call you con tell you say somebody for una or a member of your family dey sick seriously and em done rush am go hospital and the doctor say if Una no deposit money first em no go start the operation.And the way them go call you, tension self go hold you, if you no be person way get mind you fit still collapse instantly (e done happen to me and them say nah my mother but God forbid nah their mama no be my lovely mother). Op flesh and blood didn't reveal this thread to you AFAIK this came at the right time. I had my own fair share of this scam event gratefully the food Lord salvage me from falling into it based on wisdom.Sometime in August it happened that my mom had to come spend a week in my place, I still recall that faithful day was Saturday when her phone rang and she picked, the next the caller started with a cry that her daughter has had an accident and they rushed her to UPTH and as food Samaritans they have deposited  #50k out of #200k the doctor said should be deposited before they can attended to her and that the condition is critical as she's losing more blood with time and can die at any moment.Guess what! My mom screamed and started crying too. Now guess what the scammer said; that he will send my mom the account number so she can do transfer for the remaining deposit of #150k so the doctors can start treatment immediately. I immediately stepped into the phone conversation took the phone from mom spoke to the scammer that what really happened he then explained again, I told him alright we have heard and we will be on our way to the hospital but the scammer still insisted that we transfer the money before coming to the hospital so by the time we might get to the hospital the doctor would have started treating my kids sister. I said okay and ended the call.What I did was to use my own phone and dialed my sister's line her phone rang she picked greeted me and we discussed for a minute and I had to also put the phone on speaker so my mom could hear he voice and calm her mind too contrary to what the scammers had called to tell her.To cut long story short, I called back the scammers and warned them to stop such costly play that they can make someone with high BP die of shock with such devastating news, what the stupid scammer rather did was to abuse me and ended the call when he discovered I have uncovered who they really are. So I later blocked their line.  My advise to people out there when you receive similar kinda calls regarding emergencies don't be too quick to react, think outside the box and do your own consultation to verify the truth and how genuine what you're told could be.Pls let beware of scammers they are real in different forms.

The scammers actually called my colleagues and made similar gesture just like they did to your mum but her own case was reference to her elder brother daughter sighting that the girl was shot and an operation needs to be  carried out immediately and my colleagues being naive and filled with fear actually had to go and borrow about 40k naira from my proprietress and it was quite sad that she later found out that the whole thing was actually a scam.So everyone should just be cautious as these are festive period and scammers are plying everywhere to actually hit their victims.

comments.author: Amphenomenon
comments.body: Thanks for this God bless you, let always share every scope scammers are using here, its really helpful because are always innovative and different scope will continue to show up.Anyway we should be cautious of how we react to every news or information we receive especially from an unknown individuals which involves money, no matter the how urgent we should try to reach out from a trusted source and if we may not have anyone to reach out for help we can simply ask for the hospital bank details itself or anything relating to the hospital

Make person mama no go fall oo, ( God forbid) na WA oo, so them no fit think of any other thing to take get moni, na to com up with this kind expensive scam. comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: Scam dey com in different form but na make we just dey vigilant to calculate within ourselves if the story wey dem dey tell us fit be true or not. For the story wey Op share, the way wey him take handle am make sense as him go ring him uncle first to confirm him mama first before tackling the scammers but some people go don still first send half of the money or even the full 90k before trying to call and scammers go always put pressure for your body so that you go do quick send the money, and once you send am e don go be dat. So we need to dey vigilant in the way we dey handle our matter online or through calls especially how e relate money matter.

comments.author: Kelward
comments.body: I thank OP for starting this topic for dis Christmas and new year celebration time, because na bull season for carrea scammers, dem go wan leverage on people ignorance to cash in plenty money to celebrate dem Christmas and new year in grand style. Make I summarize my own experience too, one day somebody call my wife say I'm get accident and im de hospital now and im need immediate help, say im go send hospital account number, make she send 100k, with concern my wife say who im be, di guy say so she no recognize im voice? When she guess one uncle name and di guy claim am, na im I know say na scam. I collect phone and ask am say wetin be im wife name? Di guy code and cut di call. Na so we for find 100k send to scammer.So truly we need to de verify facts first before we send money, because dis wicked people no de rest, especially for dis season.

It's kind of funny how both you and your friend nearly almost fell for this potential Xmas scam you just narrated in the story above, because to me, this scam do not look ordinary, as I'm sure those callers most have gone an extra miles just to make you believe first whatever they may have told you without arguing, before considering to make an inquiry about your mum's health. So hence, this should be a very huge lesson to all  both newbies and old members here on this forum not to forget to take precautionary measure this Christmas season whenever they notice a strange number calling.

comments.body: Quote from: rachael9385 on December 15, 2023, 07:36:32 PMThe thing be say, them go call you con tell you say somebody for una or a member of your family dey sick seriously and em done rush am go hospital and the doctor say if Una no deposit money first em no go start the operation.And the way them go call you, tension self go hold you, if you no be person way get mind you fit still collapse instantly (e done happen to me and them say nah my mother but God forbid nah their mama no be my lovely mother).I experienced this matter as far back as middle of this year, it was as serious as it could be but somewhere for the back of my mind, I just know say, no be my type person go fit easily scam. Just same narration except few details that wasn’t coherent with the narrative way con make me more relaxed.In the process of the whole jagudar, I actually called to check in on who them been dey impersonate, at first the line no been dey gree go but last last, e pick up. I gats ask am how e play and the person relate me say e dey okay, nothing dey do am before or even now.E happen say, when this person been dey come back from en night shift, e branch somewhere to use person cord charge phone and the usual pop up of charge only or allow transfer of documents come up. Na em e go accept transfer of document o. Na like that the scammer to collect all e contact. With the idea say battery low and the possibility say the phone got off in no time, e con dey reach out to people on the contact o. Dey attach importance to how your name dey saved on the phone.This person go call you, describe the person make you know say, e actually meet up, cook up story of how e enter one chance, con Dey drag bag with these thief people and them con shot am for leg. Say them rush am to hospital and doctor need at least half of the bill as deposit before them go commence treatment and if treatment wasn’t done in 10minutes to stabilize the person, e fit die.Omo, it was a serious matter o but, we still gats stress am. I even ask them to give doctor the phone, cries in the background and all, doctor spoke with me and from en speech, I know say, this is an uneducated idiot. I still flow with am, ask for account details, them send am with the Dr. title attached but, when you check for back, na straight up Binomial nomenclature pop out. I just play around with them till them beg me card and later, them no gree take my calls or call back.E Dey happen, make una try Dey verify with all your sense before you release your money. E go pain well we’ll say person you sabi pass Dey chop your sweat this kind time and season.

comments.author: RockBell
comments.body: Scammers always believe they are brilliant and are looking for new ways to get money. It's even Christmas, and one fool is somewhere creating and engineering new ways to steal money from people. What strikes me is that they want to enjoy life but don't want to work. Not that we all want to work, but the question now is who will pay your bills if you don't work? You are responsible for yourself. And scammers aren't even scared. How will you put someone in that situation by telling them that their mother requires medical attention? That's bad just because you want to scam the person. Thank God your mother is fine and you weren't a victim, and thanks for sharing such information. That everyone is complaining about money. Like the topic we must confirm now before any action.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: If this same scam attempt happens to your friend,  it point to one obvious assumption that the scammer me be from a close friend or someone close to you guys. The best way to handle such acam attempt is to call the person on phone to speak with them,  don't send money to strangers,  we should be smart enough,  in fact, such scam attempts are from within for them to have gotten vital information about your mum to be able to convince you to look for the money show how deep and close the scammer is,  but just as I said always verify any call or text from a family member by calling to hear from them personally by all means possible.

comments.author: Egii Nna
comments.body: To be sincere, scammers have a high IQ. If not from this story, how can you identify that this is a scam? Hmm, a lot has been happening and is still happening. Scammers are very wise. The only solution to identifying such scams is to just be calm and think wisely. If possible, you should start asking questions about your family or asking for information about who claims to be sick, which I think might help. Though I also have such a scam story, the scammer almost got my head because when he called, he said with a friend of mine have a package to collect that has been ordered from a neighbouring country. And he put my number as an alternative, even though if they didn’t contact him, they could call me. I ask the scammer what the name of my friend is. And he called the name of the friend that we are even sitting with. I just laughed and told him to go and look for a good job or handwork that will sustain and help him feel To my greatest surprise, this scammer insisted that he was not a scammer until I told him,I am together with my friend, that he claimed to do the order. He just got off the phone immediately.So let's be wise and think before you believe in some people, especially in Naija, as everyone just hustles.
